title: What should have been the accurate partition of Punjab in 1947? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all, there should not have been any partition of Punjab. Quaid-i-Azam Muhammad Ali Jinnah asked the Sikh leadership at the time to stay with Pakistan and keep the province together but they were just very short sighted and did not listen to him. But since it was partitioned, according to the original plan and map, Ludhiana and Jalandhar were to go to Pakistan Punjab. But at the last minute, this was changed to give a direct passage to Kashmir.
